Es Half Life, una revolución en su momento del genero FPS y si llevas mucho tiempo en el gaming seguro que podrás reconocer la superioridad de este título frente a sus contemporáneos, la IA y el diseño de niveles, hace que aunque el juego parezca ser muy frenético, pares un momento a pensar que es lo que debes hacer, definitivamente un clásico muy entretenido para los fanáticos de la nostalgia.

İndirimdeyken kaçırılmayacak bir oyun yılların bile eskitemediği nadir oyunlardan arada girip kafa dağıtmak için bire bir herkese tavsiye ediyorum. Hala oynamayan varsa girsin ve oynasın birkaç saat oynadıktan sonra mekaniğine alışabilirsiniz.

Played through it twice, both times on hard difficulty. The first time, I played it for free, and I was thinking, ehh, a bunch of other games I play were sort of based on this game, so why not? I purchased it in a bundle for my second playthrough.

It has a nice jump-scare factor, it's a game of many hazards, and the storyline is really fun to follow. This is by no means a light play, not some casual shoot-em-up game. Every step you take, and every corner you peek around, could be your death (if you're not careful). It didn't take me long to start saving the game constantly. On rare occasion it's just downright unfair with the surprises, but a load game will always fix that and you know what to expect at that point.

This game is not for everyone, but if the above sounds appealing, and you like a nice fun FPS challenge, then this is for you. It also has lots of variety: many different guns, different aliens, different approaches you'll have to take to win each battle, different environments and controls in each environment, and so on. This helps to keep the game interesting. It's all very well scripted, in both senses.

I also recommend Half Life: C.A.G.E.D., which is a free (once you own HL) prison escape game that's much like Half Life (without aliens) and is pretty fun.
you have a steam account but not half life? get this game immediately

If you don't play this game, you're missing out. Those many hours I have, however, are from how ridiculously hard this game is. Unless you have the power of YouTube and patience on your side, this game will prove impossible. And don't get me started on Xen. I had a friend who completed the game and I played on that chapter. It's HELL! But other than that, the gameplay is good, the graphics are superior for typical 90s graphics (when SM64 was king) and the game has excellent story.

This game is a classic among the classics, the gameplay and graphics are pretty good considering the game launched in 1998, some parts and chapters are pretty hard sometimes because you can get kind of lost sometimes and dont know where to go, apart from that this game is amazing, the ost is pretty cool, and the end is extremely interesting, the lore is perfect and the enemies design is creative, one of my favorite fps games in general

This is a long game (18 levels) and quite hard even on Easy. Again I do not like going to Xen as it feels like a different game. There are plenty of levels without Xen. The Lambda Core and Interloper were the hardest levels. As Freeman I am awaiting a new assignment. Overall an enjoyable game.
Incrível, revolucionário e atemporal. Half-life se mostra até hoje um jogo a frente do seu tempo! É um título perfeito para quem curte um bom fps e ficção cientifica.

Half Life is a really legendary game, a cool plot, beautiful graphics (considering that the game is more than twenty years old) and much more. I like single player, or a story game, I also like to play on death match servers, because it's fun and epic, bunnyhop is better than cs. It can also be noted that the game has puzzles that are still unsolved (I'm talking about Gman). Also, if you want better graphics, then by no means buy Half Life Source, this shit that slows down, the best choice will be Black Mesa, in short Half Life Cyberpunk ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°). Overall, I rate this game at 9.8/10.
